p:
The results of LSITESYM, shown in Table 1 ▸, permit the analysis of the phonon symmetry of a single MoS 2 layer. Table 1 ▸ is organized as follows. The
irreps describing the symmetry of phonons at the 2D Brillouin-zone symmetry points are induced by the irreps D σ of the site-symmetry groups
of the Wyckoff positions where the atoms given in column 1 are located. The localized atomic displacements x, y and z transforming according to the irreps D σ are indicated in brackets. The labels of layer group
irreps at the k vector points of the two-dimensional Brillouin zone coincide with the labels of the irreps of the corresponding points of the three-dimensional Brillouin zone of the related space group
.
